name: Northern Candelabra
blurb: Northern Outpost for the Communion of the Lantern King
people: Baldr Incanes: A conrasu older than the sand that litters the ground; they're organized, fast, and knows they're better than you
<s>Illuminator</s> Baldr Bert of the Crater: The top Illuminator, who's a shoe-in for the next Baldr, but Bert will not leave that decision up to chance.
Illuminator Cecil of the Saved Child: A self-proclaimed opportunist, he's been climbing the ranks quickly.
